data.name: Joyverse
data.description:
Design Your Dream Space in 3D!
Welcome to Joyverse, the ultimate interior design experience in the Oculus Store. Powered by Spacejoy, the leading interior design platform, Joyverse is your portal to a new world of design, blending innovation, community, and immersive technology.

� Design Your Actual Space:
Design your actual space with furniture and decor from top brands. Every detail is under your control, making design an entirely new experience.

� Access Curated Designer Furniture & Decor:
Choose from an extensive collection of real furniture and decor curated by top designers. Each piece is carefully selected to inspire your creativity and elevate your designs.

� Experiment:
Express your inner designer with our intuitive 3D tools. Move, swap, rotate, and experiment with furniture and decor until you find the perfect arrangement. It's not just design; it's an art form.

� Connect with Fellow Design Enthusiasts:
Design is a collaborative journey. Connect with like-minded designers and enthusiasts in a dynamic multiplayer environment. Share ideas, collaborate on projects, and be inspired by the creativity of others.

� Learn & Grow with AI-Powered Assistance:
Whether you're a novice or a design aficionado, our AI-powered Virtual Assistant is your guide.

� Connect with Us:
Have questions, feedback, or simply want to chat? Reach out to us at hello@spacejoy.com. Your insights drive our constant innovation.

Your dream space is waiting to be crafted!
